runs.comm: quick, on a length, just outside off, left alone but it zips through at almost 90mph, good carry to the keeper
similar line and length, left again
a little tighter to off stump, swinging away and left alone
left again just outside off, decent swing for Steyn
another decent delivery but a step down the wicket and block to cover brings a single
left alone outside off but this doesn't carry through to the keeper
forward around off stump, blocks to point, no run available
a step across the stumps, tried to heave a back of a length ball to leg and gets it off the glove to long leg
good length just outside off, good carry again after it was left alone
bowled him! An off drive misses and off-stump is flicked, a fuller ball enticing the drive and it nipped back through the gate, perfect delivery, hits where the text book tells you to
similar delivery, a nervous forward prod onto off stump, comes off an inside edge down to long leg
bumper and ducked
coming forward very nervously again, tucks it towards mid on and they charge through for a run
forward and blocked around off stump
fuller ball just outside off, a wild swing and miss, rather head in the air, missed by a distance
straighter and tucked to midwicket on the front foot, straight to the fielder
a step to leg now, Steyn goes shorter and they batsman ended up too far away from the ball so the cut stroke was a distance away from the ball
forward carefully on off stump playing to point again
length just outside off, a step to leg and reaching for it, carves down to third man

pretty much the same stroke but this is edged behind and de Villiers takes it comfortably going to his right at around waist height, Taylor was reaching for it, not in control of the stroke and got a thin nick
good first delivery, just outside off, angling across the left-hander, well left alone
fuller on a similar line, forward to drive comes Ervine and pushes it to mid off's left, a brief misfield but only a single
that's more like it, thumped down the ground for four, just fuller of a good length, Masakadza launches into the drive and gets a good connection past the bowler
good length, tried to be swung to leg, Masakadza misses and gets hit on the body
too wide and cracked for four past point, good stroke from the crease
much straighter now, worked down to long leg
step to leg but Morkel followed him well and beats the stroke, hitting Masakadza on the body

and now tries to go down the ground and puts it straight to mid on. Tried to lift a length ball over the top but got too much air on it and nowhere near enough length, chipping it to mid on for a simple catch
length ball around leg stump, worked to long leg
full ball just outside off, defended forward into the covers
back of a length, hits the body as it's tried to be played to leg
comes off the body this time for a leg bye into midwicket
solid forward defence towards cover
forward with a good stride again, turned in front of mid on and they can take a quick single
back of a length, bit of a lifter, angled down to third man, well played
stays in the crease and carves down to third man
floated up outside off, a lean and a miss outside off stump
floated up again, tighter to off stump, slapped down to long on
forward and edged to the 45 on the leg side, no run possible
better played this, clipped to deep midwicket using the angle, good running brings two
tossed up just outside off, a nice push down to long off
back of a length, a step into the crease and back foot drive down to long on
swept a little awkwardly, gets it to the 45, nearly missed it and it would have been close for lbw had he done
floated up, down the wickets comes Ervine, tucked to midwicket
reverse sweep and gets it from off stump past short third man and away for four, very well played
floated up outside off, down the wicket and played to leg, wide of the bowler for a single
dragged down just a little, back foot drive between deep midwicket and long on
length ball, tried to be driven into the off side, got it off an inside edge into the ground and it runs to the keeper
floated up onto off stump, Ervine gives himself a little room and this is timed well past extra cover, very nice shot
dropped to square leg for single
swept and missed, big appeal for lbw, looks very good this, hit the batsman on the half-volley but umpire Davis says not out, assuming it was going down leg, runs into the leg side for a run
full ball, driven  back to the bowler
tucked behind square, off the pad in fact
length ball, played through square leg and they'll get two here, more good running
length ball around off stump, forward block to cover
well-timed back foot drive but straight out to deep cover
length ball around off, worked in front of square on the leg side
short ball on the line of leg stump, ducked
another short ball but this time further to leg and a wide, was pulled and missed but no touch
leg stumpish and worked down towards long leg, they charge back for the second and the return throw is horrendous, could have been an overthrow but Ervine overran
leg stump again, worked out to deep midwicket
a rush down the wicket and a tennis shot to mid off, direct hit but the batsman safely home
length ball around off stump, blocked back to the bowler
shorter ball outside off, bounces a bit and the cut stroke misses
tight to off stump again, angled to point from the crease

down the wicket and slapped straight to extra cover got it high on the bat and it went directly to the fielder at chest height where the catch was comfortably taken, can't blame the batsman for trying to force the pace but the execution again lacking

full and straight and plumb lbw first ball the batsman was nowhere near it. Fired it at the pads, full onto middle and leg and Chigumbura was caught on the crease, his attempted defensive stroke was a few years too late
full around off stump and the batsman comes forward and nudges it up to mid on
leg stump and clipped down to long leg
taken from off stump, a little across the line past mid on for a couple
length ball, played across it again and nicks it onto his pad otherwise it was another good lbw shout, might have been a touch high
back foot push wide of mid off for a sharp single
step to leg, dabbed towards point, they turn down the single

slower ball, shorter and turned to long leg, again they run hard for two, the throw was good, de Villiers gets the bails off quickly, did the dive save Ervine? Yes it did, full length dive gets him home
full and dabbed to mid on, direct hit, was the non-striker caught napping here? I think Ervine gets back by a frame, two tight calls in two balls but Ervine safe again, just
full ball just outside off, nips away and goes past the outside edge of the drive
length ball on the stumps, lifted slightly towards midwicket
length ball just outside off, played from the crease towards point
quicker short ball, step away to cut, misses
and now floors him with a bumper, ducks beneath it and ends up on his backside
lovely delivery, length ball that leaves the batsman slightly and goes past the outside edge
short and wide, cracked out to the point boundary, deep cover comes around to field
aerial drive towards extra cover, bounced just before the fielder

short ball, hooked at and gloved to the keeper, a third wicket for Kallis and this is now his best return in T20Is. Simply too quick with the bumper that went through around a middle and leg line, a thin glove to de Villiers' at head height
nervous prod forward, edged down to third man
forward around off stump, angled to point
length ball just outside off, left alone
similar line, tried to drive and gets a bottom edge to the keeper on the bounce
line again just outside off, pushed to third man
back of a length, flies over middle stump as Ervine misses backing away and trying to angle to third man
bumper around middle and leg, ducked
leg side wide
just outside off, punched to cover, decent shot for none
too straight and turned to long leg
floated up just outside off, punched down to long off
floated up onto off stump, punched back to the bowler
full toss now, clipped to long on
down the wicket and clipped towards long on, the fielder comes round and prevents the second run
forward just outside off, played back towards the bowler
forward just outside off and blocked into the covers
back of a length, angled down to third man
middle stump line, kept out back to the bowler
little wider and the open face produces an edge that flies past third slip, if he were there, and races towards the third man boundary
knocked into the covers from just outside off, trying to come forward

short down the leg side, off the glove and a cracking diving catch from de Villiers going to his left, once again a Zimbabwean completely undone by pace and accuracy but what a catch from the keeper, superb take a full stretch
quick ball outside off, the cut stroke was several years behind the ball
full ball sliding across the left-hander who lays into a cover dive out to the fence
step to leg and a huge swing and miss, the ball goes over the top of middle stump
another shot clearing the front leg, gets this deep on the leg side for a single

a bit of extra bounce, takes the edge and de Villiers takes his fourth catch going comfortably to his left-hand side, another wicket for Kallis too! Remarkable performance from him, the ball got big on the batsman who tried to run it down to third man
nice shot this, forward around leg stump, punching past the bowler for a couple, timing wasn't quite there
hint of width outside off, punched to deep cover
back of a length, punched to mid on off the inner half of the bat
beats the batsman outside off with a ball that lifted slightly
length ball around middle stump, angled to point

step down the wicket, they attempt a single to mid off, a direct hit could bring a run out here, the batsman looked to get his bat down late but he did get it down in time, a slide in and he was well home, almost a very silly piece of cricket
step to leg and cracked to point
heaved into the leg side, comes high off the bat and over midwicket but short of the deep fielders, very lucky but a couple more avoids the low total
misses with a pull
goes past the outside edge with a full ball just outside off...
down the track and slapped over the covers, they take two as deep cover comes around, slides and saves
swing and a miss to a ball which goes over middle stump
full and follows the batsman who stepped to leg and goes past leg stump
slapped again after stepping down, gets it to extra cover
aha! A boundary, another tennis shot to a length ball and finds the gap between mid off and extra cover
